sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Wal-Mart Stores ( WMT ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.7%.
Year to date, Wal-Mart Stores has lost about 3.6% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is JPMorgan Chase ( JPM ), trading down 0.9%.
JPMorgan Chase is lower by about 2.5% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are United Technologies ( UTX ), trading down 0.8%, and Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading up 0.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
